author: rse
msg: I cannot believe it. People really type in "--prefix=PREFIX" instead of using
a Unix path for PREFIX. Holy hacker god, how should those people be able to
drive a webserver when they are dull enough to type in those stuff without

author: coar
msg: ap_fnmatch() only did case-exact matching.  With the addition of
the FNM_CASE_BLIND flag bit, it can now be told to ignore case.
Considering the case-sensitivity issues cropping up on Win32,
this seemed an appropriate addition even though nothing uses it yet.

author: ben
msg: Two more that were missed in the Great Renaming.

author: brian
msg: All those who submit code towards a problem, not just the final integrator
(despite any amount of rework) should be credited.

author: ben
msg: Eliminate problems with mutiple and trailing slashes. Also deal with trailing .s.
